content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  September 29 (Fitch) (This is a correction of a release published July  7  2016. content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  July 07 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned an 'A-' rating to the  senior unsecured notes due 2046 issued by Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:  FRT; Federal). The Rating Outlook is Stable. A full list of ratings follows at  the end of this release.
